name: Aero
0:
”Alexa ask airport metrics about today's terminal traffic totals”
”Alexa ask airport metrics to get me the complete security checkpoint traffic for today”
”Alexa ask airport metrics to send me today's overall terminal traffic report”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: airport metrics
Developer Terms of Use
des: Aero audibly reports all daily traffic patterns, delays, and peak times for airport terminals, security checkpoints, and curbside arrivals. Aero uses data from AiX Metrics to give precise passenger forecasting and reporting information to airport personnel. Aero can also send out PDF reports via email for any past, present, or future traffic dates.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
